sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import { Row, Col ,ListGroup,Image,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import {getOrderDetails} from "../actions/orderActions" import Loader from '../components/Loader' import {useParams } from "react-router-dom" const OrderScreen = () => { useEffect(()=>{ disaptch(getOrderDetails(id)) },[]) let { id } = useParams() let history = useNavigate() const disaptch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const {order,loading,error} = orderDetails; console.log("check",order) order.orderItems = order.orderItems.reduce((acc,item) => acc + item.price * item.qty,0) return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {order.shippingAddress.country},

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Your Cart is Empty :( {order.orderItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.name} {item.qty} x {item.price} = ${parseInt(item.qty * item.price)} ))} ) }

Order Summery

Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} {error && {error}} } export default OrderScreen
